articles.title: Palestinian President Refers to Friendly Ties with DPRK
articles.content:
Palestinian President Refers to Friendly Ties with DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- Ma Tong Hui, DPRK ambassador to Palestine, presented his credentials to Mahmoud Abbas, president of the State of Palestine, on July 9.
					 The president said that the friendly relations between Palestine and the DPRK are the historical ones provided by President Yasser Arafat and President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He said that he was so grateful to the Korean people for always supporting the struggle of the Palestinian people.

articles.title: Swedish Charge d'Affaires AI Meets with Canadian Citizen
articles.content:
Swedish Charge d'Affaires AI Meets with Canadian Citizen
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- The Swedish charge d'affaires ad interim here on Friday had a meeting under the consular auspices with Rim Hyon Su, who is serving his term of sentence after the relevant judgment in Dec. 2015 as he committed hostile acts against the DPRK.
					 Rim talked about his health and asked the charge d'affaires ad interim to convey his request for making proactive efforts to settle his issue to the Canadian government.
					
					 The DPRK provides the Swedish embassy which looks after consular affairs of the Canadian citizens in the DPRK with the meeting under the consular auspices with Rim on the basis of the Vienna Convention on Consular Relations and in the humanitarian spirit.

articles.title: FM Spokesman on UNSC "Resolution on Sanctions"
articles.content:
FM Spokesman on UNSC "Resolution on Sanctions"
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK) gave the following answer to the question raised by the KCNA on July 14 as regards the fact that the U.S. is attempting to rig up another "sanctions resolution" against the DPRK, branding its successful test-fire of the intercontinental ballistic rocket Hwasong-14 as a "global threat":
					 The U.S., flabbergasted at the DPRK's success in the test-fire of the intercontinental ballistic rocket Hwasong-14, is making frenzied moves at the United Nations Security Council (UNSC) to fabricate another "resolution on sanctions" tougher than ever against the DPRK.
					
					 Right after the emergency meeting of the UNSC, the U.S. began letting out a stream of invectives every day against the DPRK's test-fire while making frantic efforts together with its vassal forces to produce a "press statement" in order to create the atmosphere of sanctions against the DPRK. At the same time, the U.S. is causing a lot of racket circulating the draft of a new "resolution on sanctions" at the UNSC and prattling that it would to put it to the "vote" without any compromise.
					
					 The racket of anti-DPRK "sanctions resolutions" being made by the U.S. is the manifestation of the heinous intention to evade the responsibility for having driven the DPRK to bolster its nuclear force by pursuing the policy of extreme hostility and nuclear threat against the latter and obliterate its sovereignty and right to existence.
					
					 The DPRK's test-fire of the intercontinental ballistic rocket is an exercise of its legitimate right to self-defense to thoroughly eradicate the over half a century long nuclear threat from the U.S. against the DPRK and reliably defend peace and stability of the Korean peninsula and the region at large.
					
					 The resounding success of the test-fire of the intercontinental ballistic rocket Hwasong-14 has fully demonstrated the will and capability of the DPRK to annihilate the U.S. by a single blow to the very heart of its mainland in case it fails to act with discretion.
					
					 It is time for the U.S. to renew its perspective on the DPRK's strategic position which has reached the dazzling heights, and to act with prudence. However, it is inviting its ultimate doom by resorting to the sanctions and pressure campaign against the DPRK.
					
					 It will be a fatal mistake to consider any chance that the DPRK which rose to a dignified nuclear power and an ICBM state would tolerate the reckless "sanctions" racket of the U.S. and other hostile forces.
					
					 Should the UNSC adopt another "resolution on sanctions", this will trigger corresponding measures by the DPRK and respond to the "resolution" with its act of justice.

articles.title: U.S. Troops in S. Korea Can Never Escape Strikes by KPA's Long-range Artillery: Panmunjom Mission
articles.content:
U.S. Troops in S. Korea Can Never Escape Strikes by KPA's Long-range Artillery: Panmunjom Mission
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Panmunjom Mission of the Korean People's Army (KPA) released a statement on Friday over the recent desperate and undisguised moves of the U.S. to provoke a nuclear war against the DPRK and perpetuate its forces' presence in south Korea.
					 The statement said:
					
					 On Tuesday the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces, which moved the Command of their 8th Army present in south Korea to Humphrey Base in Phyongthaek of Kyonggi Province, invited bosses of the south Korean puppet government and military and even human scum including ultra-right conservatives to an "opening ceremony of the new building" of the Command.
					
					 The commander of the 8th Army in his "welcoming speech" praised the south Korean lackeys, terming the move an "event demonstrating the solid south Korea-U.S. alliance" and allowing journalists to look round the interior of the base.
					
					 As far as the transfer of the U.S. 8th Army Command to Phyongthaek is concerned, the U.S. has pushed ahead with it in collusion with the puppet regime since 2003 in order to move its aggressor forces bases in south Korea to the areas south of the River Han to get rid of the striking range of the KPA's long-range artillery strike.
					
					 Lurking behind it is the ulterior design of the U.S. to save its troops only, indifferent to the plight of the south Korean puppet army at stake.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are busy hyping the transfer of their 8th Army Command, the shock brigade that will play a flagship role in igniting a war against the DPRK. This fully revealed the U.S. scenario to perpetuate its military presence in south Korea and stand in confrontation with the DPRK to the end in league with the south Korean puppet warmongers.
					
					 The U.S. regards the Korean peninsula as a vantage point of strategic importance where the strength of maritime forces and the strength of land forces are interchanging. It is the century-old Asia policy of the U.S. to occupy the whole peninsula with south Korea as its springboard and thus realize its wild ambition for dominating the world.
					
					 It is a tragedy of the U.S. that it is unaware of the tremendous might of the army of the DPRK.
					
					 The bases of the U.S. imperialist aggressors in south Korea, the primary targets of the KPA, can never escape the mercilessly annihilating strikes by its long-range artillery, no matter whether they are located in Phyongthaek or in Pusan.
					
					 The U.S. imperialist warmongers will never escape the miserable destruction if they persist in foolhardy military confrontation moves in south Korea despite the warnings of the KPA.

articles.title: Floral Basket and Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps Here
articles.content:
Floral Basket and Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps Here
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the fifth anniversary of conferment of the title of the DPRK Marshal on him.
					 They were handed to Army General Pak Yong Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces, by Roman O. Jimenez Ortega, military attache of the Cuban embassy who is doyen of the corps, on Friday.

articles.title: Construction of Broad-gauge Railway Progresses Apace in DPRK
articles.content:
Construction of Broad-gauge Railway Progresses Apace in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- Amid the fast construction of Hyesan-Samjiyon broad-gauge railway in the DPRK, the laying of its roadbed nears completion.
					 According to an official concerned, the Hyesan-Samjiyon Railway Construction Brigade under 216 Division completed the construction of bridges and the main railway tunnel and pushes ahead with building other tunnels at the final stage.
					
					 The construction of broad-gauge railway is a part of the project for sprucing up Samjiyon County in the northern part of the country.

articles.title: Superior Healthcare System of DPRK
articles.content:
Superior Healthcare System of DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- It is a consistent policy of the Workers' Party of Korea and DPRK government to take good care of people's health. 
					 Thanks to this policy, all the people in the country are taking free medical treatment under the superior socialist healthcare system.
					
					 It can be evidenced by excellent medical service for women at the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital.
					
					 The hospital offers an intensive care to women pregnant with triplets or quadruplets and women with gynecopathy from across the country as well as puerperae in Pyongyang. And its in-patients are entitled to receive medical treatment of internal, urinary and ophthalmic diseases.
					
					 The hospital has also carried out countrywide preventive checkup for women in spring and autumn to detect mastopathy and breast cancer in early stages.
					
					 If diagnosed as mastopathy and breast cancer, anyone can be provided with free medical treatment at obstetrical and gynecological department of city and county people's hospitals in their residential areas or at provincial maternity hospitals and the Breast Tumour Institute of the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital.

articles.title: National Symphony Orchestra Gives Concert at State Academy of Sciences
articles.content:
National Symphony Orchestra Gives Concert at State Academy of Sciences
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- The National Symphony Orchestra gave a concert at the State Academy of Sciences from July 12 to 14.
					 The artistes gave a concert in a peculiar style for employees of the academy conducting a dynamic drive of breaking through the cutting edge.
					
					  It began with orchestra "Ode to the Motherland". Put on the stage were such colorful numbers as orchestra "July 27 March" and male solo "Thunder over Jong Il Peak".
					
					 The performers highly praised respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un for wisely leading our scientists and technicians to fulfill the responsibility and role as pace-setters in the age of knowledge-based economy with brilliant wisdom and superb leadership.
					
					 Put on the stage were also orchestra "Glory to General Kim Jong Un" and "We Are Mallima Riders" and other numbers.

articles.title: U.S. Sanctions and Pressure Never Work on DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Sanctions and Pressure Never Work on DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is crying out for mounting a military attack on the DPRK, terming its steps for bolstering the capability for self-defence a "threat to the world" in a bid to escalate international sanctions and pressure on it.
					 This is just a ridiculous bluffing of those taken aback by the invincible might of the DPRK, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in a commentary, and goes on:
					
					 The DPRK remains unfazed by the desperate moves of the U.S. to stifle it.
					
					 Its development of intercontinental ballistic rocket is a self-defensive option to put a definite end to the decades-long U.S. hostile policy and nuclear war threat to the DPRK.
					
					 It is a manifestation of stupidity that the U.S. works hard to check the victorious advance of the service personnel and people of the DPRK, terming its entirely just measures for protecting itself and putting nuclear force on a higher level a "threat."
					
					 The U.S. is gravely mistaken if it arrogantly thinks that even a single shell should never be dropped on its mainland while carpet-bombing other countries.
					
					 The U.S. strategic vision on the DPRK should undergo a fundamental change and the U.S. should drop its hostile policy toward the DPRK and stop the nuclear threats and blackmails to it.

articles.title: Japan's Announcement of "Guideline for Existence" Assailed
articles.content:
Japan's Announcement of "Guideline for Existence" Assailed
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- The Japanese authorities announced the "guideline for existence" to cope with the "threats" from someone and they are busy informing inhabitants of the way for emergency evacuation. The "guideline for existence" is reportedly the first government guideline which is informing inhabitants of the way to survive in the first "enemy's attack" after the Second World War. The essence is to inform citizens of the way to survive when a missile would be launched toward Japan from the DPRK. More than 40 TVs and 70 newspapers were set in motion to advertise the "guideline for existence".
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday in a commentary terms this a hysteric action beyond normal way of thinking.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 Independence, peace and friendship are the DPRK's tenets of foreign policy. The DPRK's test-fires of new strategic weapons to cope with the ever-more escalating U.S. military threats and blackmail and moves to ignite a nuclear war are to defend permanent peace and stability in the region.
					
					 However, the Japanese authorities frighten Japanese people as if a war would break out at once, talking about the first "enemy's attack" after the Second World War and groundless "threats" from the DPRK.
					
					 Their ulterior intention is to deliberately incite horror and hostility toward the DPRK and create an atmosphere favorable for the revival of militarism.
					
					 Explicitly speaking again, the urgent task for Japan is to give up the ambition for reinvasion and sincerely liquidate the past crimes against the Koreans and other people.
					
					 This is the genuine guideline for existence of Japan to live as a normal state.

articles.title: Document of Japanese Government Proving Organized Sexual Slavery Opened to Public
articles.content:
Document of Japanese Government Proving Organized Sexual Slavery Opened to Public
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- An official document of the Japanese government proving the sexual slavery was opened to public on July 9, according to a report. 
					 The document made by the police chief in Wakayama Prefecture of Japan was sent to the Ministry of Interior in 1937. Recorded in the document is the fact that three Japanese, instructed by Japanese army, "abducted" Korean women in Tanebari area as "comfort women."
					
					 It is the first time that the abduction of Korean women for sexual slavery was confirmed through the official document of the Japanese government.

articles.title: Bullying Rampant in South Korean Schools
articles.content:
Bullying Rampant in South Korean Schools
 Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- Bullying in schools is getting serious in south Korea, according to its Yonhap News.
					 According to a survey, more than 37,000 boys and girls fell victim to bullying at schools from October last year to March 20 this year.
					
					 Bullying cases are reportedly on the steady increase typically at primary schools.

articles.title: African Regional Internet Workshop Held
articles.content:
African Regional Internet Workshop Held
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- An African regional internet workshop took place in Nigeria on July 3 under the theme of "The Eternal Sun" to commemorate the 23rd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 It was co-sponsored by the African regional preparatory committee and Nigerian preparatory committee for the Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu and the African Regional Committee for Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People.
					
					 Present at the workshop were personages and staff members of the international preparatory committee and regional and national preparatory committees for the Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu and political parties, organizations and organizations for the study of the Juche idea in Benin, Ethiopia, DR Congo, Guinea and other countries.
					
					 Introduced there were letters of solidarity sent by the Asia-Pacific regional, Ocean regional and national preparatory committees for the Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu and organizations of various countries.
					
					 A keynote report and speeches were made there.
					
					 Damian Ogbonna, co-chairman of the international preparatory committee for the Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, in his keynote report praised President Kim Il Sung for leading the Korean revolution and the global cause of independence to victory by applying the Juche idea and lauded leader Kim Jong Il for firmly defending the country's sovereignty and dignity and making a great contribution to ensuring world peace and security.
					
					 He said that the theories and methods on revolution and construction set forth and implemented by Kim Il Sung during the whole historic course of the Korean revolution serve as the textbook of struggle to be followed by every country and nation aspiring after freedom and liberation.
					
					 He stressed that the Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu which is to be held in August with splendor will demonstrate the aspiration and desire of the world progressives to hold Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal sun and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un as the sun leading the human cause of independence to victory in the 21st century.
					
					 Speeches were made by Dagnachew Cherinet, co-chairman of the African regional preparatory committee for the Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, Ibrahim Mantu, chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association, Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Benin－Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader", and others.
					
					 Speakers appealed to the progressives to hold Kim Jong Un in high esteem, saying that his august name is shining as the symbol of peace, justice, dignity and progress.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the workshop.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in African Regional Internet Workshop
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in African Regional Internet Workshop
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a letter from Damian Ogbonna, national chairman of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria who doubles as co-chairman of the international preparatory committee for the Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu and chairman of the African Regional Committee for Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People, on July 3 on behalf of the participants in the African regional internet workshop held to commemorate the 23rd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The letter noted that through the workshop the participants together with the Korean people and world progressives looked back with deep emotion upon the great career of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung who performed the undying exploits before history and humankind with his outstanding idea and theory and revolutionary practices.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung founded the party, state and army, established the socialist system centered on the popular masses in Korea and set a good example of accomplishing the human cause of independence and achieved the great exploits in accomplishing the Korean nation's cause of reunification.
					
					 He set forth the slogan "People of the World Advocating Independence, Unite!" and sincerely helped the African countries in achieving national independence and independent development and energetically led all the progressive movements such as the Non-Aligned Movement to be true to their ideals and principles.
					
					 Today the Korean people are smashing all sorts of the U.S. and hostile forces' challenges and the DPRK is demonstrating its might and dignity as a satellite manufacturer and launcher and nuclear weapons state recognized by the world under the leadership of Comrade Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The letter expressed firm conviction that the Korean people would register bigger success in building a powerful socialist country true to the guidance of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Korean People's Efforts for Independent Reunification Supported in India
articles.content:
Korean People's Efforts for Independent Reunification Supported in India
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- The All India Indo-Korean Friendship Association extends invariable support and solidarity to the Korean people's efforts for defusing the danger of a war on the Korean peninsula and achieving the independent reunification of the country.
					 It said this in a statement on June 24 on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					
					 The statement appealed to the world people to struggle against the U.S. and its vassal forces which are only indulging in false propaganda against the DPRK. It went on:
					
					 June 25 marks the 67th anniversary of the Korean War ignited by the U.S. on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The atrocities committed by the U.S. during the Korean War were the most brutal crimes against humanity, unprecedented in the history of world wars.
					
					 The war ended after the conclusion of the armistice agreement in July 1953, but peace has not yet settled on the peninsula.
					
					 The DPRK has always wanted the armistice agreement to be replaced with a peace accord.
					
					 Nevertheless, the U.S. has staged large-scale nuclear war drills targeting the DPRK, constantly escalating the tensions on the peninsula.
					
					 The DPRK's line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force is the only key to protecting its sovereignty and right to existence and achieving peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and in the region.
					
					 The more desperate aggressive war moves of the U.S. would only bring the bitterest ruin to it.

articles.title: Month of Anti-U.S. Joint Struggle Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Month of Anti-U.S. Joint Struggle Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- There took place events in various countries on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 From June 16 to 23 a solidarity meeting was held in the Czech Republic, a lecture in Austria and a film show in Nigeria.
					
					 The vice general secretary of the Central Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party said:
					
					 June 25, 1950 witnessed the start of the Korean War by the U.S., and July 27, 1953 is the day when the army and people of the DPRK defeated the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 Far from drawing a lesson from its humiliating defeat in the Korean War, the U.S. is aggravating the tensions on the Korean peninsula through the provocative nuclear war drills.
					
					 In order to make genuine peace and stability settle on the Korean peninsula and put an end to the division of the Korean nation, it is necessary to have the U.S. withdraw its forces from south Korea at once.
					
					 The honorary chairman of the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association said that thanks to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un the Korean people will continue winning only victories in the showdown with the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 The chief of the Youth Group for Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism formed in Austria and other speakers noted that the army and people of the DPRK repulsed the invasion of the DPRK by the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world and thus reliably defended the sovereignty of the country under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Mahmoud Abbas se refiere a relaciones de amistad con la RPDC
articles.content:
Mahmoud Abbas se refiere a relaciones de amistad con la RPDC
Pyongyang, 14 de julio (ACNC) -- El nuevo embajador de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Ma Tong Hui, presento el dia 9 sus cartas credenciales al presidente del Estado de Palestina, Mahmoud Abbas.
					 El mandatario palestino subrayo que las relaciones de amistad entre los dos paises son las historicas preparadas por el presidente Yasser Arafat y el Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					  Expreso agradecimiento al pueblo coreano que siempre envia apoyo a la lucha del pueblo palestino.

articles.title: Portavoz del MINREX condena a EE.UU. por tratar de inventar nueva "resolucion de sancion" anti-RPDC
articles.content:
Portavoz del MINREX condena a EE.UU. por tratar de inventar nueva "resolucion de sancion" anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 14 de julio (ACNC) -- En entrevista con la ACNC concedida hoy con motivo de que Estados Unidos se mueve para fabricar otra "resolucion de sancion" contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea cuestionando como "amenaza mundial" el exitoso lanzamiento de prueba del cohete balistico intercontinental "Hwasong-14", el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio la siguiente respuesta:
					 Perplejo por el exito de lanzamiento de ensayo del cohete balistico intercontinental "Hwasong-14" de nuestro pais, EE.UU. esta obsesionado por aprobar en el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU la inaudita "resolucion de sancion superintensa" contra la RPDC.
					
					  Despues de la reunion emergente del Consejo de Seguridad, EE.UU. habla mal por estos dias del lanzamiento de nuestro ICBM, por una parte, y por la otra, publican con sus satelites la "declaracion conjunta" para crear el ambiente de sancion anti-RPDC.
					
					  Ademas, divulga el proyecto de nueva "resolucion de sancion" en el Consejo de Seguridad y anda atareado para someterlo a la "votacion" sin ningun compromiso. 
					
					Los movimientos de EE.UU. para aprobar la "resolucion de sancion" anti-RPDC devienen una muestra de su siniestra intencion de suprimir nuestra soberania y derecho a la existencia ocultando su crimen de haber obligado a la RPDC al incremento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares con la extremada politica hostil y la amenaza y chantaje nucleares.
					
					El lanzamiento de prueba del cohete balistico intercontinental es el ejercicio del legitimo derecho a la autodefensa para acabar de manera raigal con la amenaza nuclear contra la RPDC de EE.UU., que perdura mas de medio siglo, y defender con firmeza la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y la region.
					
					Con el exito total de ese lanzamiento, hemos demostrado plenamente la voluntad y capacidad de destruir de un golpe la parte central de EE.UU. si este pais se mueve sin discrecion.
					
					En vez de ver correctamente la posicion estrategica de la RPDC, situada en el maximo plano, EE.UU. recurre a la campana de sancion y presion, lo que deviene un acto de suicidio.
					
					Sera un error fatal considerar que la RPDC, digna potencia nuclear y poseedora de ICBM, perdonaria la imprudente campana de sancion y presion de EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles.
					
					Si se adopta en el Consejo de Seguridad la nueva "resolucion de sancion", la RPDC tomara medidas correspondientes y respondera con acciones de justicia.

articles.title: Publicada declaracion del portavoz de Representacion del EPC en Phanmunjom
articles.content:
Publicada declaracion del portavoz de Representacion del EPC en Phanmunjom
Pyongyang, 14 de julio (ACNC) -- En estos dias, los imperialistas norteamericanos exponen mas abiertamente su intento de perpetuar la ocupacion del suelo surcoreano multiplicando sus tentativas de desatar la guerra nuclear de agresion contra el Norte de Corea.
					 Al respecto, el portavoz de la Representacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea en Phanmunjom publico el dia 14 una declaracion que sigue:
					
					  El dia 11, el edificio de la comandancia del 8o ejercito norteamericano ocupante del Sur de Corea fue trasladado a la Base Humphrey de Phyongthaek de la provincia de Kyonggi y tuvo lugar la "ceremonia inaugural del nuevo edificio" a que fueron invitados los cabecillas del gobierno y ejercito titeres surcoreanos y los conservadores ultraderechistas y otra chusma.
					
					  En su "discurso de bienvenida" pronunciado ese dia, el comandante del 8o ejercito alento a sus lacayos surcoreanos diciendo que la base militar norteamericana de Phyongthaek es "otro testimonio de la solidez de la alianza Sudcorea-EE.UU." y cometio la fanfarronada de mostrar a los periodistas hasta el interior del enclave.
					
					El traslado a Phyongthaek de la comandancia del 8o ejercito norteamericano habia sido consultado y promovido desde el ano 2003 junto con los titeres surcoreanos con el objetivo de evacuar las bases militares de EE.UU. en el Sur de Corea a la region al sur del rio Han por el temor al fuego artillero de largo alcance del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					Especificamente, fue el producto de la siniestra intencion de los uniformados yanquis de mantener solo su vida sin importar que se mueran los soldados titeres surcoreanos.
					
					El mismo hecho de que EE.UU. anuncia a bombo y platillos del traslado de esa unidad militar, brigada de choque y avanzada de la eventual guerra contra el Norte de Corea, significa exponer abiertamente su intento de perpetuar la ocupacion del Sur de Corea y enfrentarse hasta el final con la RPDC.
					
					Al considerar la Peninsula Coreana como importante punto estrategico, o sea, el cruce de las fuerzas maritimas y las continentales, EE.UU. quiere mantener su presencia militar en el territorio surcoreano para ocupar toda Corea y mas adelante, realizar su ambicion de dominar el mundo entero. He aqui la meta de la politica norteamericana sobre Asia que sigue vigente siglo tras siglo.
					
					La tragedia del imperio americano reside en que el no conoce bien el inagotable poderio del EPC.
					
					Dondequiera que se encuentren, sea Phyongthaek o Pusan, las bases militares norteamericanas, primer blanco de ataque de nuestro ejercito, no podran esquivar jamas el implacable golpe demoledor de nuestros artilleros de largo alcance.
					
					Sufriran el destino de destruccion tragica si los belicistas yanquis se mantienen estacionados en suelo surcoreano y cometen imprudentes acciones de enfrentamiento militar desoyendo nuestra advertencia.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena la "guia de supervivencia" anunciada en Japon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena la "guia de supervivencia" anunciada en Japon
Pyongyang, 14 de julio (ACNC) -- Recientemente, las autoridades japonesas dieron a la publicidad la llamada "guia de supervivencia" movilizando mas de 40 cadenas de TV y 70 periodicos a lo largo del pais.
					  Se dice que esa guia se trata de la primera orientacion del nivel gubernamental para ensenar la manera de sobrevivir en el primer "ataque del enemigo" despues de la Segunda Guerra Mundial.
					
					  Ella consiste en dar a los ciudadanos el consejo practico sobre el remedio de sobrevivir en el caso de que se lance un misil desde la RPDC hacia Japon.
					
					  Este acto histerico no se comprende con el normal modo de pensar.
					
					  Asi critica el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este viernes y prosigue:
					
					  La Republica Popular Democratica de Corea toma como ideal de su politica exterior la independencia, la paz y la amistad.
					
					Sirven tambien para la paz y estabilidad duraderas de la region los lanzamientos de prueba de nuevas armas estrategicas, realizados por ella frente a la amenaza y chantaje militares de Estados Unidos y sus tentativas de guerra nuclear.
					
					  Sin embargo, las autoridades japonesas asustan a los habitantes como si estallara ahora mismo la guerra hablando absurdamente de la "amenaza" de la RPDC y del primer "ataque de enemigo" despues de la Segunda Guerra Mundial.
					
					  La intencion de ellas reside en inculcar el pavor y la hostilidad a la RPDC y preparar el ambiente favorable al renacimiento de militarismo.
					
					  Volvemos a exponer en claro que el asunto primordial de Japon es dejar la ambicion de reagredir el continente asiatico y liquidar sinceramente sus crimenes cometidos en el pasado contra el pueblo coreano y los otros de varios paises.
					
					  Esto es la verdadera clave de Japon para sobrevivir como Estado normal.
